author: zsfelfoldi
content:
I updated the agenda of Trustless Log Index Breakout #1:
https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1869
After the feedback on EIP-7745 being very complex I explored some earlier alternative ideas again and now I managed to come up with a much simpler design variant. I did not decide to abandon the earlier version yet but it would be useful to discuss this over the first session and if possible then decide which direction to pursue further.
I would also like to invite Nethermind and Erigon to discuss this if possible, as the main critics of the complexity of the current EIP.
